results.title: The Contest for power
results.creator_credit: James Beveridge and National Film Board of Canada
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “The Crossroads of the world: a study of North Africa and the Middle East”.
Change is neither easy nor even. In this film you see neighboring countries in North Africa and the Middle East with vastly different forms of government. In monarchies, all power resides in a king; in others, military juntas rule. Here and there democratic governments hold power. Everywhere, from Iraq to Algeria, the ferment of change shows in many ways. Part four of the original six-part series.

results.title: The Consultation
results.creator_credit: Liz Crosby, Frances McGivern and AFTRS
results.brief_description: Betty (Leverne McDonnell) sees Larry (Matthew Crosby) across a bar. There is mutual interest, engagement, excitement, and of course, attraction. A stylish, erotic drama with a twist in the tale; a romance for the times we live in.

results.title: The Constant Gardener
results.creator_credit: Scion Films, Studio Babelsberg, Epsilon Motion Pictures, UK Film Council, Focus Features, Blue Sky Films, Potboiler Productions, Odile Dicks-Mireaux, Tracey Seaward, Thierry Potok, Simon Channing Williams, Fernando Meirelles, Mark Tildesley, Jeffrey Caine and Henning Molfenter
results.headline_credit: China, Germany, United Kingdom and United States of America, 2005
results.brief_description: Justin Quayle is a low-level British diplomat who has always gone about his work very quietly, not causing any problems. But after his radical wife Tessa is killed he becomes determined to find out why, thrusting himself into the middle of a very dangerous conspiracy.

constellations_other.name: My People
constellations_other.description: The breakout single for Sydney dance duo The Presets, 'My People' was one of the biggest hits of 2007 and propelled by the engaging music video.

results.title: The Consequences of nuclear war
results.creator_credit: Ross Christopher and Australian National University
results.brief_description: Highlights of a conference, with the same name as the title, which was held at the Australian National University. The papers dealt with various aspects of the nuclear arms race and were presented by a range of Australian and international speakers.

results.title: The Conscience of a child (TEFC)
results.creator_credit: Edmond Levy, Harold Mayer, American Psychological Society and Mayar-Sklar Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Focus on behaviour: the science of psychology”.
The ways in which psychologists are studying, in the laboratory of Dr. Robert Sears at Stanford University, the growth and development of personality and emotional behaviour in children. The roles portrayed by Eddie, his mother and father are re-enactments based on actual research and findings in Dr Sears’ experiment.
